  • Method Details

    • createSession

      public static com.jcraft.jsch.Session createSession(String host, int port, String username, String password, String privateKeyFileName, String passphrase) throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
      Returns a new session created with given host, port, username, password, privateKey and optional passphrase.
      Parameters:
      host - the host to connect to.
      port - the port to connect to.
      username - the username to use.
      password - the password to use.
      privateKeyFileName - the private key file to use.
      passphrase - the passphrase to use.
      Returns:
      a new session.
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - if username or host are invalid, or if passphrase is not right.

    • createSession

      public static com.jcraft.jsch.Session createSession(String host, int port, String username, String password) throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
      Returns a new session created with given host, port, username and password.
      Parameters:
      host - the host to connect to.
      port - the port to connect to.
      username - the username to use.
      password - the password to use.
      Returns:
      a new session.
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - if username or host are invalid.

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid(com.jcraft.jsch.Session session) throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
      Returns true if session is valid.
      Parameters:
      session - the session to check.
      Returns:
      true if session is valid.
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - if session is already connected.

    • openSftpChannel

      public static com.jcraft.jsch.ChannelSftp openSftpChannel(com.jcraft.jsch.Session session) throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
      Opens a SFTP channel with given session.
      Parameters:
      session - the session to open channel with.
      Returns:
      a new SFTP channel.
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException - if session is not connected.

      Parameters:

      src - the source file to move.
      dst - the destination file to move.
